voces.title: About Muxu
voces.paragraph1: At Muxu Cheesecakes we believe life's best moments happen around a table: during an endless after-dinner chat, an impromptu afternoon tea with friends, a family celebration, or a kiss with your partner after dessert. That's why our cakes are more than cheesecakes‚Ä¶ they're little stories of love, warmth and togetherness.
voces.paragraph2: "Muxu" means kiss in Basque, the origin of our original cheesecake recipe, and it's what we strive to share with every creation: a sweet gesture that comforts, accompanies and brings people together.
voces.paragraph3: We know how important it is for the experience to be perfect from start to finish. That's why we offer home delivery, taking care of every detail so your cheesecake arrives in perfect condition‚Äîfresh, beautiful and ready to delight from the very first bite. Convenience and quality are essential to us: we want you to focus only on enjoying.
voces.paragraph4: At Muxu Cheesecakes we bake sweetness, deliver warmth and celebrate the moments that truly matter.
voces.tagline: A kiss in the shape of a cheesecake.

allergens.title: Allergens
allergens.summary: All our cheesecakes contain wheat, egg and milk. Some flavours include nuts or soy.

descriptions.trigo: Contains wheat and gluten in the biscuit base.
descriptions.huevos: Contains egg in the cheesecake mixture.
descriptions.leche: Contains dairy: cream cheese, cream and butter.
descriptions.nueces: Contains tree nuts (almonds, pistachios, peanuts, etc.) depending on the flavour.
descriptions.soja: May contain soy derivatives in some flavours (white chocolate, Oreo, Lotus, Suchard).

lotus.fullDescription: Sweet and spiced. The most iconic Lotus biscuit becomes an irresistible cheesecake. Caramel, cinnamon and spices in every bite for a unique flavour that awakens the senses.

oreo.name: Oreo
oreo.fullDescription: Nostalgia in every bite. Beloved Oreo cookies in a creamy, delicious cheesecake. Chocolate and vanilla bring back the flavours of childhood with an elegant, sophisticated touch.

pistachio.name: Pistaccio
pistachio.fullDescription: Elegant and unique. The distinctive taste of pistachio with our most refined cheesecake. A sophisticated dessert with a creamy texture and intense flavour, perfect for special occasions.
